tldr: This paper presents meteorological observations made between October 1837 and April 1839 in Alten, Finmarken. The author, S. H. Thomas, records daily barometer and thermometer readings at 9 a.m., 2 p.m., and 9 p.m., along with weather remarks. The data is collected from Kaafjord, in latitude 69°58'3" N and longitude 23°43'10" E.
